quotes.author: Chuck Norris
quotes.quote: Chuck Norris' calendar goes straight from March 31st to April 2nd; no one fools Chuck Norris."

quotes.author: Chuck Norris
quotes.quote: Bill Gates lives in constant fear that Chuck Norris' PC will crash.

quotes.author: Chuck Norris
quotes.quote: If it looks like chicken, tastes like chicken, and feels like chicken but Chuck Norris says its beef, then it's friggin' beef.

quotes.author: Mr.T
quotes.quote: Itâ€™s a little known fact that Mr. T was one of the Three Wisemen. His gifts to baby Jesus were gold chains and pity.

quotes.author: Mr.T
quotes.quote: Mr. T does not Leggo the Eggo, he eats the waffle and the toaster. Mr. T does not eat Toaster Strudel.

quotes.author: Homer
quotes.quote: Marge! Look at all this great stuff I found at the Marina. It was just sitting in some guy's boat!

quotes.author: Homer
quotes.quote: If you really want something in this life, you have to work for it. Now, quiet! The're about to announce the lottery numbers...

quotes.author: Homer
quotes.quote: Heh Heh Heh! Lisa! Vampires are make believe, just like elves and gremlins and eskimos!

quotes.author: Bill Cosby
quotes.quote: A word to the wise ain't necessary -- it's the stupid ones that need the advice..

quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quotes.quote: Money doesn't make you happy. I now have $50 million but I was just as happy when I had $48 million.

quotes.author: Jack Handey
quotes.quote: It takes a big man to cry, but it takes a bigger man to laugh at that man.

quotes.author: Jack Handey
quotes.quote: "To me, boxing is like a ballet, except there's no music, no choreography, and the dancers hit each other.

quotes.author: Jack Handy
quotes.quote: Reading a good book is like the author is right there, in the room, talking to you, which is why I don't like to read good books.
